stories.text:
I'm in Australia, but have ideas with an Oceanian target audience (not including AU/NZ). In particular, Fiji sounds like the most promising market to target initially (based on population, economy, etc.), but I'm quite open to consider other locations, and eventually intend to have coverage across many areas.

I'm technical and can code, and would particularly be interested in someone who understands the local business environment.

Also would be interested in hearing people's experiences in the area in general even if they're not looking to do a startup.

(I did try to use the YC cofounder matching service for this, but it seems that you can't specify target location except as a time radius around your current location. Also, searching for similar threads about business in the region returned surprisingly little results.)
stories.title: Any Founders in Oceania?

stories.text:
Emacs supports rectangular editing. Other text editors have multiple cursors which kind of solve the same problem.

Which one do you think is superior?
stories.title: Ask HN: Rectangles vs. multi-cursor text editor?
